title: Lemon and ginger barbecued prawns
ingredients: ['100ml (4 fl oz) olive oil', '1 dessertspoon sesame oil', '4 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, peeled', '2 tablespoons grated fresh root ginger', 'handful fresh coriander', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1.25kg (3 lb) fresh king prawns, peeled and deveined', 'skewers']
